thread.title: Hirschmann Solutions to feature its latest connectivity technologies at CTIA Super Mobility 2015
thread.title_full: Hirschmann Solutions to feature its latest connectivity technologies at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hirschmann Solutions to feature its latest connectivity technologies at CTIA Super Mobility 2015
text:
Hirschmann Solutions
AUBURN HILLS, Mich. , Aug. 17, Hirschmann Solutions , a leading supplier of antenna and transceiver systems, will display its latest connectivity technologies at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 in the M2M Zone (booth 5346) at the Sands Expo and Convention Center in Las Vegas on September 9-11, 2015 . Hirschmann will showcase its full portfolio of GNSS positioning, terrestrial and satellite communications products, as well as the new M2M Gateway module and Dedicated Short Range Communications (DSRC) antennas.
CTIA Super Mobility 2015 is the world's largest forum focused on mobile innovation, drawing professionals from all across the new mobile landscape to experience the latest in breakthrough technology, including IoT/M2M technologies.
"Hirschmann Solutions is excited to return to CTIA Super Mobility as an exhibitor," said Hirschmann Solutions U.S. Vice President of Sales and Marketing Chris Bala . "With our industry leading portfolio of quality engineered products, we offer solutions that stand above the competition. We look forward to meeting with current customers and new prospects alike, to see how we can help solve their most demanding communications applications."
The M2M Gateway module is entered into the 2015 CTIA Awards competition and can be voted for using the CTIA website . This module provides advanced communications and connectivity for fleet vehicles, heavy duty trucks and construction and agricultural equipment â€“ offering telematics service providers and their customers reduced time to market and reduced system design complexity.
Additionally, the company's new DSRC offerings will be on display. The DSRC antenna supports the development of next-generation vehicle technologies for safer, more efficient connected and automated mobility with DSRC, Cell, and WLAN connectivity.
About Hirschmann Solutions:
Hirschmann Solutions is a business unit of Hirschmann Car Communication GmbH, Germany , offering communication technologies for smarter solutions to its customers. The product portfolio includes a wide range of antennas, smart antennas, communication modules with embedded transceivers, tracking devices and in-vehicle entertainment for most terrestrial and satellite based services. With a global workforce of approximately 900 employees, the Hirschmann brand is known for its high quality, best-in-class technology and equipment tailored to customer needs.
Visit Hirschmann Solutions on the web at: www.hirschmann-solutions.com .
